verses.verse: And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that when Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> for which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> him to <S%H413><s%> them, even <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%>

Then spoke <S%H559><s%> Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hoshaiah, <S%H1955><s%> and Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah, <S%H7143><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the proud <S%H2086><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> saying <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> speakest <S%H1696><s%> falsely: <S%H8267><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> thee to say, <S%H559><s%> Go <S%H935><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> there: <S%H8033><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> Baruch <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Neriah <S%H5374><s%> setteth thee on <S%H5496><s%> <S%H853><s%> against us, for <S%H4616><s%> to deliver <S%H5414><s%> us into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> that they might put us to death, <S%H4191><s%> <S%H853><s%> and carry us away captives <S%H1540><s%> <S%H853><s%> into Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

So Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah, <S%H7143><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the forces, <S%H2428><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

But Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah, <S%H7143><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the forces, <S%H2428><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were returned <S%H7725><s%> from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had been driven, <S%H5080><s%> to dwell <S%H1481><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%>

Even <S%H853><s%> men, <S%H1397><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> and children, <S%H2945><s%> and the king's <S%H4428><s%> daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> person <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> Nebuzaradan <S%H5018><s%> the captain <S%H7227><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%> had left <S%H5117><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan, <S%H8227><s%> and Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> and Baruch <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Neriah. <S%H5374><s%>

So they came into <S%H935><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> thus came <S%H935><s%> they even to <S%H5704><s%> Tahpanhes. <S%H8471><s%>
Then came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> in Tahpanhes, <S%H8471><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in thine hand, <S%H3027><s%> and hide <S%H2934><s%> them in the clay <S%H4423><s%> in the brickkiln, <S%H4404><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is at the entry <S%H6607><s%> of Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> in Tahpanhes, <S%H8471><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah; <S%H3064><s%>

And say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> and will set <S%H7760><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> upon <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I have hid; <S%H2934><s%> and he shall spread <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> his royal pavilion <S%H8237><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them.

And when he cometh, <S%H935><s%> he shall smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and deliver such <S%H834><s%> as are for death <S%H4194><s%> to death; <S%H4194><s%> and such <S%H834><s%> as are for captivity <S%H7628><s%> to captivity; <S%H7628><s%> and such <S%H834><s%> as are for the sword <S%H2719><s%> to the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And I will kindle <S%H3341><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the gods <S%H430><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and he shall burn <S%H8313><s%> them, and carry them away captives: <S%H7617><s%> and he shall array himself <S%H5844><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> as <S%H834><s%> a shepherd <S%H7462><s%> putteth on <S%H5844><s%> <S%H853><s%> his garment; <S%H899><s%> and he shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> from thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> in peace. <S%H7965><s%>

He shall break <S%H7665><s%> also <S%H853><s%> the images <S%H4676><s%> of Beth-shemesh, <S%H1053><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall he burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>
